mapper.select: select rownum as rnum, n.* from (select reserve_no as reserveNo, member_no as memberNo, camp_no as campNo, check_in_date as checkInDate, check_out_date as checkOutDate, reserve_status as reserveStatus, reserve_place as reservePlace, reserve_price as reservePrice, reserve_pw as reservePw, car_number as carNumber, reserve_memo as reserveMeno from reservation order by 1 desc) n
